long_description: Get rid of the clutter in your junk drawer and replace it with a single item: the Leatherman Juice CS4 Multitool. It's loaded with 15 tools yet it fits neatly in a purse, pocket or drawer. Includes spring-action scissors, a sharp knife blade and a host of other can't-live-without-'em tools for use at home, while traveling and on the trail. High-carbon stainless-steel knife blade is strong and sharp. 4 screwdrivers include a Phillips screwdriver, medium/large flat-head screwdriver, small flat-head screwdriver and an extra-small flat-head screwdriver. Also comes with needlenose pliers, regular pliers, wire cutters, saw, awl, can opener, bottle opener and a corkscrew. Anodized-aluminum exterior stands up to abrasion and corrosion. Lanyard attachment lets you attach the Leatherman Juice CS4 Multitool to a backpack zipper, carabiner or keychain.
short_description: Get rid of the clutter in your junk drawer and replace it with a single item: the Leatherman Juice CS4 Multitool. It's loaded with 15 tools yet it fits neatly in a purse, pocket or drawer.
